typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		company_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		county as string,
		postal as string,
		phone1 as string,
		phone2 as string,
		email as string,
		web as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(first_name),
	counts = count(),
		column1 = count(phone1),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
